text: Josefina García-Marruz Badía (28 April 1923 – 27 June 2022), also known as Fina García Marruz, was a Cuban poet and literary researcher. García Marruz was born in Havana, Cuba. She won the National Prize for Literature in 1990.Nota biográfica de Fina García Marruz en CubaLiteraria.com She also won the Pablo Neruda Ibero-American Poetry Award (2007), and the Reina Sofía de Poesía Iberoamericana (2011).Javier Rodríguez Marcos. García Marruz died on 27 June 2022 in Havana at the age of 99. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cuban poets Category:Writers from Havana
title: Fina García Marruz
